title: Added Name Fields to Signup Form
description: Users can now enter their first and last names during account creation for personalized experiences
details: Added First Name and Last Name input fields to the signup form. Fields are side-by-side for better UX, both are required, and full names are passed to the backend as 'FirstName LastName'. This replaces the previous email prefix approach and enables proper personalization throughout LEXA.
author: System

title: Improved Signup Error Messages
description: Better error handling for duplicate emails, invalid formats, and weak passwords
details: Enhanced signup error messages to be more user-friendly: (1) Duplicate email: 'This email is already registered. Please sign in instead.', (2) Invalid email: 'Please enter a valid email address.', (3) Weak password: 'Password must be at least 6 characters long.' Provides clearer guidance and reduces user confusion during account creation.

title: Fixed Conversation Stage Progression
description: LEXA now properly progresses through conversation stages instead of repeating the opening
details: Fixed conversation stage logic that was causing LEXA to stay in 'opening' stage and repeat the same greeting. Updated stage determination: turn 1 = opening, turn 2+ = deepening/discovery. Added contextual responses that acknowledge user's previous answers and ask new, relevant questions each turn.
author: System

title: Resolved Backend Auto-Reload Issues
description: Fixed stuck backend reloads by implementing proper process management
details: Backend uvicorn auto-reload was getting stuck when detecting file changes. Implemented proper process termination and restart procedures. Multiple port conflicts were identified and resolved. Backend now restarts cleanly when code changes are detected.
